title: Citi Presents New Citi Multipremios Platinum with New Benefits for Cardholders
summary: El Salvador - Citi El Salvador announced today the launch of the Citi MultiPremios Platinum credit card as part of its commitment to innovation and value-added services adapted to its clients' lifestyle.
tag-1: Citi Presents New Citi Multipremios Platinum with New Benefits for Cardholders
tag-3: El Salvador – Citi El Salvador announced today the launch of the Citi MultiPremios Platinum credit card as part of its commitment to innovation and value-added services adapted to its clients' lifestyle.
tag-4: Oriented toward people who enjoy going out to eat and to entertainment venues, the new Citi MultiPremios Platinum credit card lets clients earn two MultiPremios Miles for every dollar they spend on entertainment and restaurants, in addition to one mile for purchases at other commercial establishments and automatic payments. As a welcome gift, clients can earn up to 35,000 Multipremios Miles the first year.
tag-5: "At Citi, our goal is to offer simple solutions that benefit our clients' lifestyle. To this end, we are improving the value offered by all Citi credit cards affiliated with the MultiPremios loyalty program, including the MultiPremios Platinum card, which now offers double miles for restaurant and entertainment purchases. Clients can redeem MultiPremios miles for gifts, prizes, travel and even credit toward outstanding balances," commented José Eduardo Luna, Products and Segments Manager at Citi El Salvador.
tag-6: MultiPremios, Citi's loyalty program, allows clients to redeem miles at their convenience either directly at points of service of affiliated establishments; by calling Citiphone, 2212-2000; by transfer from a MultiPremios to LifeMiles account; or by crediting the award amount to the card balance just like cash.
tag-7: "Citi seeks to redefine the banking experience with innovative products such as our credit cards and easy, fast and secure access to digital banking. We want our clients to have a unique experience when they use our products," Luna added.
tag-8: Card benefits include access to Citi Private Pass, the entertainment portal available to all Citi cardholders in the United States and now in Central America as well. The site provides access to U.S. reservations for countless concerts, plays, sports and family events, restaurants and more. Citi Private Pass purchases also earn double miles.
tag-9: If you still don't have a Citi credit card, ask for one by calling 2212-2000 or visiting www.citi.com.sv.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
